beforeHooks.fullTitle: SauceDemo Automation Test - Cross Browser & Headless/Headed "before all" hook in "SauceDemo Automation Test - Cross Browser & Headless/Headed"
beforeHooks.code:
console.log('before() → Membuat driver (Chrome Headed)');
driver = await createDriver('chrome', 'headed');

beforeHooks.title: "before each" hook in "SauceDemo Automation Test - Cross Browser & Headless/Headed"

beforeHooks.code:

await login(driver);
